pages.text: Ate usa hasati tom daro jisa ne tuhanu ate tuhadi'am pichali'am pirhi'am nu paida kita hai
Unham ne kiha tuhade upara tam kise ne jadu kara dita hai
Ate tusim sade varage hi ika manukha ho. Ate asim tam tuhanu jhuthe lokam vicom samajhade ham
Isa la'i sade upara asamana to ko'i tukara degau je tusim sace ho
Su'aiba ne akhi'a, mera raba cagi tar'ham janada hai, jo kujha tusim kara rahe ho
Tam unham ne usa nu jhuthala dita. Phira unham nu badala vale dina di afata ne pharha li'a
Besaka uha ika vade dina di saza si. Besaka isa vica nisani hai ate unham vicom zi'adatara manana vale nahim
Ate besaka tuhada raba sakatisali ate rahimata vala hai
Besaka iha sasara de malaka alaha di utari ho'i bani hai
Ate isa nu amanatadara, bharoseyoga farisata lai ke utari'a hai
Tuhade dila ute tam ki tusim nasihata karana vali'am vico hovom
Sapasata arabi bhasa vica
ate isa da ulekha pahile maiîâ€Œgabaram di'am kitabam vica vi hai
Ate ki inham la'i iha nisani nahim. Isa nu isara'ila de vasa de ulamam (vidavana) janade hana
Ate jekara asim isa nu kise ajami' (gaira araba vasi) upara utarade
Phira uha unham nu parha ke suna'unda tam uha isa upara imana li'a'una vale na banade
Isa tar'ham asim imana na li'a'una vali'am nu papi'am de dila vica pa rakhi'a hai
Iha loka udom taka imana nahim li'a'unage jadom taka daradanaka saza na dekha laina
Phira uha unham upara acanaka a javegi ate inham nu khabara vi nahim' hovegi
Phira uha kahinage ki sanu kujha mauka mila sakada hai
Ki uha sadi afata nu jaladi maga rahe hana
daso ki je asim inham nu kujha salam taka labha dide rahi'e
Phira unham ute uha azaba a jave jisa tom' inham nu dara'i'a ja riha
